Translations.Text: shubh hai vah allaah, jisake haath mein raajy hai tatha jo kuchh vah chaahe, kar sakata hai
jisane utpann kiya hai mrtyu tatha jeevan ko, taaki tumhaaree pareeksha le ki tumamen kisaka karm adhik achchha hai? tatha vah prabhutvashaalee, ati kshamaavaan hai
jisane utpann kiye saat aakaash, oopar tale. to kya tum dekhate ho atyant krpaasheel kee utpatti mein koee asangati? phir punah dekho, kya tum dekhate ho koee daraad
phir baar-baar dekho, vaapas aayegee tumhaaree or nigaah thak-haar kar

aur hamane sajaaya hai sansaar ke aakaash ko pradeepon (grahon) se tatha banaaya hai unhen (taaron ko) maar bhagaane ka saadhan shaitaanon[1] ko, aur taiyaar kee hai hamane unake lie dahakatee agni kee yaatana
aur jinhonne kufr kiya apane paalanahaar ke saath to unake lie narak kee yaatana hai. aur vah bura sthaan hai
jab vah phenke jaayenge usamen to sunenge usakee dahaad aur vah khaul rahee hogee
prateet hoga ki phat padegee rosh (krodh) ser, jab-jab phenka jaayega usamen koee samooh to prashn karenge unase usake prahareeh kya nahin aaya tumhaare paas koee saavadhaan karane vaala (rasool)
vah kahengeh haan hamaare paas aaya saavadhaan karane vaala. par hamane jhuthala diya aur kaha ki nahin utaara hai allaah ne kuchh. tum hee bade kupath mein ho
tatha vah kahengeh yadi hamane suna aur samajha hota to narak ke vaasiyon mein na hote
aise vah sveekaar kar lenge apane paapon ko. to dooree[1] hai narak vaasiyon ke lie
nihsandeh jo darate hon apane paalanahaar se bin dekhe unheen ke lie kshama hai tatha bada pratiphal hai
tum chupake bolo apanee baat athava oonche svar mein. vaastav mein vah bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai seenon ke bhedon ko
kya vah nahin jaanega jis ne utnn kiya? aur vah sookshmadarshak[1] sarv soochit hai
vahee hai jis ne banaaya hai tumhaare lie dharatee ko vashvartee, to chalo-phiro usake kshetron mein tatha khao usakee pradaan kee huee jeevika. aur usee kee or tumhen phir jeevit ho kar jaana hai
kya tum nirbhay ho gaye ho usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah dhansa de dharatee mein phir vah achaanak kaanpane lage
athava nirbhay ho gaye usase jo aakaash mein hai ki vah bhej de tum par pathareelee vaayu to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaisa raha mera saavadhaan karana
jhuthala chuke hain in[1] se poorv ke log to kaisee rahee meree pakad
kya unhonne nahin dekha pakshiyon kee or apane oopar pankh phailaate tatha sikodate. un ko atyant krpaasheel hee thaamata hai. nisandeh vah pratyek vastu ko dekh raha hai

ya kaun hai jo tumhen jeevika pradaan kar sake, yadi rok le vah apanee jeevika? balki ve ghus gaye hain avaigya tatha ghrna mein
to kya jo chal raha ho aundha ho kar apane munh ke bal vah adhik maargadarshan par hai ye jo seedha ho kar chal raha ho seedhee raah par
he nabee! aap kah den ki vahee hai jis ne paida kiya hai tumhen aur banaaye hain tumhaare kaan tatha aankh aur dil. bahut hee kam aabhaaree (krtagy) hote ho
aap kah deh useene phailaaya hai tumhen dharatee mein aur usee kee or ekatrit[1] kiye jaoge
tatha vah kahate hain ki ye vachan kab poora hoga yadi tum sachche ho
aap kah deh us ka gyaan bas allaah hee ko hai. aur main keval khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon
phir jab vah dekhenge use sameep, to bigad jaayenge unake chehare jo kaafir ho gaye. tatha kaha jaayegaah ye vahee hai jisakee tum maang kar rahe the
aap kah deh dekho yadi allaah naash kar de mujh ko tatha mere saathiyon ko athava daya kare ham par, to (batao ki) kaun hai jo sharan dega kaafiron ko duhkhadaayee[1] yaatana se
aap kah deh vah atyant krpaasheel hai. ham usapar eemaan laaye tatha useepar bharosa kiya, to tumhen gyaan ho jaayega ki kaun khule kupath mein hai
aap kah deh bhala dekho yadi tumhaara paanee gaharaee mein chala jaaye, to kaun hai jo tumhen la kar dega bahata hua jal
